mapper.select: SELECT count(id_asistencia) FROM asistencia WHERE id_empleado = #{idEmpleado} AND fecha = DATE(NOW()) AND estatus = 'A'
SELECT count(id_asistencia) FROM asistencia WHERE id_empleado = #{idEmpleado} AND hora_salida IS NOT NULL AND fecha = DATE(NOW()) AND estatus = 'A'
SELECT count(estatus) AS estatus FROM asistencia WHERE id_empleado = #{idEmpleado} AND estatus = 'I'

SELECT c.descripcion AS perfil_empleado, e.nombre AS nombre, e.apellido_pat AS apellido_paterno, e.apellido_mat AS apellido_materno, ae.comentarios AS comentarios, #{fecha} AS fecha, ae.hora_entrada AS hora_entrada, ae.hora_salida AS hora_salida, e.id_empleado AS id_empleado FROM empleado e LEFT JOIN catalogo c ON c.codigo = e.codigo_puesto LEFT JOIN asistencia ae ON ae.fecha = #{fecha} AND ae.id_empleado = e.id_empleado WHERE e.id_cuadrilla = #{idCuadrilla} AND e.estatus = 'A' ORDER BY e.fecha_ingreso
